original_text: So even though I wrote to you, it was neither on account of the one who did the wrong nor on account of the injured party, but rather that before God you could see for yourselves how devoted to us you are.
korean_text: 그런즉 내가 너희에게 쓴 것은 그 불의를 행한 자를 위한 것도 아니요 그 불의를 당한 자를 위한 것도 아니요 오직 우리를 위한 너희의 간절함이 하나님 앞에서 너희에게 나타나게 하려 함이로라

sentences.original_text: So even though I wrote to you
it was neither on account of the one who did the wrong
nor on account of the injured party
how devoted to us you are
